wikipedia_page.main: Robert Etheridge FRS FRSE FGS (3 December 1819 – 18 December 1903) was an English geologist and palaeontologist.

response: * Robert Etheridge (1819-1903), English geologist and palaeontologist.
*Robert Etheridge, Junior (1847–1920), English palaeontologist who worked extensively in Australia
